name: Polly Rhythm
description:
You play as Polly: a hungry, music-loving parrot.

Press the space bar or click to flap your wings to the beat. Press the arrow keys or A/D to move left and right. Try and catch as many seeds as you can!

Made for Mini Game Jam 99: "Birds"

Game, music, and assets by Parsnip36.

(Author's Note: Before you come for me, I know the music in the game isn't polyrhythmic. Enjoy the punny parrot :)

EDIT February 6, 11:48 PM EST: Some players may encounter game resolution or audio sync problems in certain browsers. I have provided a build that you can run on Windows. Please consider this option if you encounter any difficulties. Thanks for playing!
